          <title>
            <string language="en">Car design can reduce air resistance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Autodesign kann Luftwiderstand verringern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La conception de voiture peut réduire la 
résistance d'air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O projeto do carro pode reduzir a resistência do
ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il disegno dell'automobile può ridurre la 
resistenza dell'aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο αυτοκινήτων μπορεί να μειώσει την αντίσταση
αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El diseño del coche puede reducir resistencia 
del aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the air resistance of two different shape designs of a car.</string>

          </description>
